eventDescription:
1. Teams will be provided with a set of 25 questions
  2. The questions will be a mix of both Multiple-choice & Direct-Answer Q.
  3. The questions will be based on hypothetical situations wherein laws of physics will be twisted & conceptual aptitude will be checked.
  4. Marks will be allotted to each question individually.
  5. Team with maximum marks will be declared the winner
rules:
General Rules

  1. Students will participate in teams of maximum 3.
  2. Use of Mobile phone is strictly prohibited.
  3. In case of discrepancy, decision of organizers is final.
